environs.modname.tooltip: 為 Minecraft 環境添加生態域聲音和方塊效果。
environs.cfg.logging.tooltip: 定義日誌記錄的行為方式
environs.cfg.logging.EnableDebug.tooltip: 啟用/停用模組的除錯日誌
environs.cfg.logging.FlagMask.tooltip: Bitmask for toggling various debug traces
environs.cfg.biomes.Sealevel.tooltip: Sealevel to set for Overworld (0 use default for World)
environs.cfg.biomes.DimBlacklist.tooltip: Dimension IDs where biome sounds will not be played
environs.cfg.effects.Steam.tooltip: Enable/disable Steam Jets where lava meets water
environs.cfg.effects.Dust.tooltip: Enable/disable Dust Motes dropping from under blocks
environs.cfg.effects.Fireflies.tooltip: 啟用/停用植物周圍的螢火蟲效果
environs.cfg.effects.Splash.tooltip: Enable/disable Waterfall Splash effects when water spills down
environs.cfg.effects.WaterRipple.tooltip: Enable/disable Water Ripple effects for rain and water splash
environs.cfg.effects.WaterRippleStyle.to: The render style of water ripples
environs.cfg.aurora.tooltip: Options that control Aurora behavior and rendering
environs.cfg.aurora.MaxBands.tooltip: Cap the maximum bands that will be rendered
environs.cfg.sound.BiomeVolume.tooltip: Scaling factor to apply to biome sounds
environs.cfg.sound.SpotVolume.tooltip: Scaling factor to apply to spot sounds
environs.cfg.sound.WaterfallVolume.toolt: Scaling factor to apply to waterfall sounds
environs.cfg.sound.OccludeWaterfall.tool: Perform occlusion processing for sounds in the WATERFALL category
environs.cfg.fog.tooltip: Options that control the various fog effects in the client
environs.cfg.fog.Morning.tooltip: Show morning fog that eventually burns off
environs.cfg.fog.MorningChance.tooltip: Percentage chance morning fog will occur
environs.cfg.fog.Weather.tooltip: 依據降雨強度的增強型迷霧
environs.cfg.fog.Haze.tooltip: 玩家海拔越高，體驗到的迷霧就越多
environs.cfg.fog.Biome.tooltip: 啟用生態域的特殊濃度和顏色的迷霧
environs.cfg.effects.WaterfallCutoff.too: Limit sounds to waterfall strengths above this value
